title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 40.32 - Marketing and product research
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 40.32 - Marketing and product research

State Regulations

The commissioner, with the advice and assistance of the
advisory board, is hereby authorized to contract with any person or persons to
carry on or cause to be carried on milk marketing and/or dairy product research
and to expend such monies as may be available pursuant to this Part for such
purpose. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
40.32

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
